page.main_description: Install custom Meshtastic firmware on your device with browser-based tools or direct downloads.
page.meta_description: Custom Meshtastic firmware builds web installer

select_device.filter_placeholder: Type to filter or click to select...
select_device.no_versions_available: No versions available for this device

firmware_info.title: Firmware Information
firmware_info.select_device_view: Select a device to view details
firmware_info.select_device_instructions: Select a device and firmware version to view detailed information and installation instructions.
firmware_info.alternative_download_desc: Use download buttons to get firmware files for manual flashing.
firmware_info.uf2_download_desc: Download UF2 file and copy to your device when in bootloader mode.
firmware_info.device_bootloader_desc: Double-click reset button or use reset pin to enter bootloader mode.
firmware_info.uf2_rp2040_desc: Download UF2 file and drag-and-drop to the RP2040 when in bootloader mode.
firmware_info.enter_bootloader_desc: Hold BOOTSEL button while connecting USB to enter bootloader mode.
firmware_info.download_firmware_desc: Use appropriate download button for your device type.
firmware_info.follow_instructions_desc: Refer to your device's manual for specific installation steps.
firmware_info.important_warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Important: This will replace your current firmware.
firmware_info.backup_warning: Make sure to backup any important data before proceeding with installation.

download_buttons.download_ota_firmware: Download OTA firmware file for update over-the-air
download_buttons.download_nrf_erase: Download NRF Erase file for memory erasing. Don't forget to confirm erasing in serial console!
download_buttons.download_uf2_firmware: Download UF2 firmware file for manual installation
download_buttons.download_complete_archive: Download complete firmware archive for manual installation
download_buttons.esp_web_tools_desc: ESP Web Tools allows you to install Meshtastic firmware directly in your browser without any additional software.
download_buttons.connect_device: Connect your ESP32 device to your computer via USB
download_buttons.click_connect: Click "Connect" in the ESP Web Tools interface
download_buttons.wait_complete: Wait for the installation to complete

notes.build_variants_desc: Not all board-version combinations are built. Open an issue on GitHub to request specific variants.
notes.language_builds_desc: Builds with "-ru" include Russian language support. Similar patterns exist for other languages.
notes.daily_builds_desc: Builds ending in ".daily" are created from master branch, built 4 times daily at 5:00, 11:00, 17:00, 23:00 GMT.
notes.custom_boards_desc: Custom board configurations are available. Submit issues or PRs via GitHub.
notes.source_code_desc: Firmware is built from official Meshtastic source with only build/variant modifications applied.
notes.backup_config_desc: Always backup your device configuration before flashing new firmware.
notes.battery_level_desc: Ensure your device has sufficient battery charge or is connected to power during installation.
notes.stable_connection_desc: Maintain a stable USB connection throughout the firmware installation process.
notes.recovery_mode_desc: Know how to enter recovery/bootloader mode for your specific device model.
notes.read_documentation_desc: Consult your device documentation for specific installation instructions and requirements.
notes.if_encounter_issues: If you encounter issues with these firmware builds, please:
notes.verify_firmware_variant: Verify you're using the correct firmware variant
notes.report_issues: Report issues on the relevant GitHub repository
notes.beta_version: Beta version - Use at your own risk
notes.disclaimer_text: This service is provided as-is without any warranty. The developers are not responsible for any damage to devices or data loss.
notes.terms_agreement: By using this service, you agree to these terms and acknowledge the risks involved.

footer.installer_description: Installer powered by advanced web-based tools for firmware development and installation:
footer.alternative_endpoints: Alternative service endpoints for improved accessibility and performance:

important_notice.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Important Notice
important_notice.unofficial_builds: These are unofficial builds of Meshtastic firmware, provided for testing and development purposes. They may contain experimental features and are not officially supported by the Meshtastic project.
important_notice.backup_before_flashing: Always backup your device configuration before flashing firmware.
